# Intentionally vulnerable dependencies for testing security scanners
# ⚠️ DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION

# Django with known CVEs (SQL injection, directory traversal)
Django==2.2.0

# Flask with cookie parsing vulnerability
Flask==1.1.1

# PIL/Pillow with buffer overflow vulnerabilities
Pillow==8.1.0

# PyYAML with arbitrary code execution
PyYAML==5.3.1

# Jinja2 with ReDoS vulnerability
Jinja2==2.11.2

# Requests with proxy authentication header leak
requests==2.25.0

# urllib3 with CRLF injection
urllib3==1.26.3
